body: Kevin Trudeau, the "king of infomercials," has been sent to jail for fraud. The judge sentenced him to 10 years, and then said, "But wait, thereâ€™s more!", and added another five years.
title: Sep 19, 2013 - Kevin Trudeau, the “king of infomercials,” has been sent to jail for fraud. The judge sentenced him to 10 years,
